reason.zh: 发现鲸鱼在熊市中流入14,682.73 SOL，且空头爆仓高（$1,195,887），资金费率低（0.0022%），存在轧空机会。价格趋势向上（RSI 66.3），但受制于熊市，使用低杠杆。
reason.en: Whale inflow detected (14,682.73 SOL) in bear market with high short liquidations ($1,195,887) and low funding rate (0.0022%), suggesting short squeeze potential. Price trend is up (RSI 66.3), but limited leverage due to bear market.
